home.title: B40 Food Aid Management Platform
home.subtitle: Helping connect those in need with food resources across Malaysia. Our platform coordinates between users, food banks, and organizations to ensure efficient distribution of food aid.

howItWorks.title: A Simple Process for Food Aid
howItWorks.subtitle: Our platform connects users in need with local food banks and aid organizations through a streamlined process.

step1.title: Request Food Aid
step1.desc: Submit a simple request using our icon-based interface. No registration required - just tell us what you need and where you are.

step2.title: Get Tracking Number
step2.desc: Receive a unique tracking number to monitor your request status anytime. Keep this number safe.

step3.title: Assignment to Food Bank
step3.desc: Our aid organizations review requests and assign them to the closest food bank with matching inventory.

step4.title: Receive Your Aid Package
step4.desc: Once your request is fulfilled, you'll be notified when and where to collect your food aid package.

networkSection.title: Food Banks Across Malaysia
networkSection.subtitle: We partner with food banks throughout the country to ensure aid reaches those who need it most.

trackRequest.title: Track Your Request
trackRequest.subtitle: Enter your tracking number to check the status of your food aid request.

errors.notFound: Request not found. Please check your tracking number.
errors.general: An error occurred while tracking your request. Please try again.

requestForm.title: Request Food Aid
requestForm.subtitle: Please fill out this form to request food assistance. Select the items you need and provide your information.
requestForm.itemsDesc: Click on items to add them to your request. Click again to increase quantity (up to 3), and again to remove.
requestForm.trackingNumberDesc: Please save this number to check your request status later.
requestForm.successDesc: Our team will review your request and assign it to the nearest food bank.
requestForm.errorRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
requestForm.errorSelectItems: Please select at least one food item
requestForm.errorSubmit: Failed to submit request. Please try again.
